Hero.description: Connect with like-minded individuals in a community that appreciates beauty and authenticity. Experience social media redesigned for the modern age.

Benefits.title: Why should you use this app?
Benefits.description: Unlock a world of authentic connections on Onlyface, where your unique beauty opens the door to meaningful relationships. Our exclusive approval system ensures you join a network of individuals who appreciate genuine connections.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Find answers to common questions about Onlyface and how our community works.

Showcase.description: Watch our presentation video to understand how Onlyface is redefining social connections.

Testimonials.title: What our community says
Testimonials.description: Join thousands of satisfied users who have found authentic connections on Onlyface.

1.title: Member Approval System
1.desc: Efficient Validation: Our Member Approval System simplifies the vetting process, enabling verified members to review and authorize new applicants, ensuring a trusted and secure community

2.title: Share Your Own Story
2.desc: Narrate Your Experience: With 'Share Your Own Story,' you can craft and express your personal experiences, connecting with others through compelling narratives.

3.title: Selected Photo Network
3.desc: Curate and Share: Our platform features a selected photo network, allowing users to showcase and discover exceptional images, fostering a vibrant community of visual storytelling and inspiration.

CTA.title: Ready to join the community?
CTA.description: Experience a new way of connecting with authentic people. Download Onlyface now.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
Privacy.interpretationDesc: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
Privacy.definitionsIntro: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:
Privacy.account: Account means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.
Privacy.affiliate: Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party.
Privacy.application: Application refers to Onlyface, the software program provided by the Company.
Privacy.device: Device means any device that can access the Service.
Privacy.personalData: Personal Data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
Privacy.usageData: Usage Data refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself.
Privacy.collecting: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
Privacy.personalDataIntro: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include:
Privacy.name: First name and last name
Privacy.useOfDataIntro: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:
Privacy.provideMaintain: To provide and maintain our Service
Privacy.performanceContract: For the performance of a contract
Privacy.securityDesc: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
Privacy.contactDesc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us:

EULA.title: End User License Agreement
EULA.intro: This End User License Agreement ("Agreement") is a legal agreement between you and Onlyface ("Company", "we", "us", or "our").
EULA.licenseGrantDesc: Subject to the terms of this Agreement, the Company grants you a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicensable, revocable license to download, install and use the Application on devices owned or controlled by you.
EULA.restrictionsIntro: You agree not to, and you will not permit others to:
EULA.restrict1: License, sell, rent, lease, assign, distribute, transmit, host, outsource, disclose or otherwise commercially exploit the Application.
EULA.restrict2: Modify, make derivative works of, disassemble, decrypt, reverse compile or reverse engineer any part of the Application.
EULA.restrict3: Remove, alter or obscure any proprietary notice (including any notice of copyright or trademark) of the Company or its affiliates, partners, suppliers or the licensors of the Application.
EULA.restrict4: Generate, share, or promote any content depicting Child Sexual Abuse and Exploitation (CSAE).
EULA.propertyDesc: The Application, including without limitation all copyrights, patents, trademarks, trade secrets and other intellectual property rights are, and shall remain, the sole and exclusive property of the Company.
EULA.contentDesc: You are responsible for the content you post on Onlyface. You grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, transferable, sub-licensable, worldwide license to use, display, reproduce, and distribute your content in connection with the Application.
EULA.terminationDesc: This Agreement shall remain in effect until terminated by you or the Company. The Company may, in its sole discretion, at any time and for any or no reason, suspend or terminate this Agreement with or without prior notice.
EULA.liabilityDesc: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall the Company or its suppliers be liable for any special, incidental, indirect, or consequential damages whatsoever.
EULA.lawDesc: The laws of Taiwan, excluding its conflicts of law rules, shall govern this Agreement and your use of the Application.
EULA.contactDesc: If you have any questions about this Agreement, please contact us at support@onlyface.app.

Safety.title: CSAE Prevention Policies
Safety.description: Our application is dedicated to preventing Child Sexual Abuse and Exploitation (CSAE).
Safety.subtitle: Our commitment to safety and protection.
Safety.introDesc: Onlyface is dedicated to preventing Child Sexual Abuse and Exploitation (CSAE). We enforce strict policies and employ advanced measures to ensure a safe environment for all users.
Safety.prohibitedIntro: We strictly prohibit the following activities:
Safety.prohibited1: Any form of child sexual abuse material (CSAM)
Safety.prohibited2: Grooming or coercing minors into inappropriate activities
Safety.prohibited4: Any attempt to facilitate or promote child trafficking
Safety.prohibited5: Sharing or distributing exploitative content involving minors
Safety.measure1Desc: Our AI-powered and human review systems actively scan and remove CSAE-related content.
Safety.measure2Desc: Identity verification processes help prevent the creation of fake accounts used for illicit activities.
Safety.measure3Desc: Minors are restricted from accessing adult content, and age verification steps are enforced.
Safety.measure4Desc: We implement automated monitoring tools to detect and flag suspicious activities.
Safety.measure5Desc: Users can report suspicious behavior through our in-app reporting system.
Safety.measure6Desc: We provide parents with tools to monitor and restrict their child's activities on the platform.
Safety.enforcement1Desc: Reported CSAE violations are reviewed and acted upon immediately.
Safety.enforcement2Desc: We work closely with law enforcement agencies and child protection organizations.
Safety.enforcement3Desc: Users found violating CSAE policies will face an irreversible account ban.
Safety.enforcement4Desc: We take legal measures against individuals involved in CSAE activities.
Safety.contactDesc: If you encounter any CSAE-related content or suspicious activity, please report it through our in-app reporting feature or contact our support team at support@onlyface.app.

DeleteAccount.title: How to delete my account?
DeleteAccount.subtitle: Follow the steps below to complete the account deletion process.
DeleteAccount.metaDesc: Step-by-step guide on how to delete your Onlyface account.

step1.title: Step 1
step1.desc: Click the expand button in the upper right corner.

step3.title: Click Delete Account
step3.desc: Click the 'Delete Account' red text below.

step4.title: Confirm deletion
step4.desc: After clicking 'Yes,' your account will be temporarily deactivated. After 30 days, your account and related activities will be automatically deleted.

DeleteAccount.helpDesc: If you encounter any issues during the deletion process, please contact our support team at support@onlyface.app. We are here to help you.

FAQItems.question: How does Onlyface work?
FAQItems.answer: Onlyface is a social networking app where users connect based on their physical appearance. Upon sign-up, users upload a selfie photo and enter a pending status. To become fully active, more than 1/3 of the total users must approve their photo.

FAQItems.question: What is the purpose of the pending status?
FAQItems.answer: The pending status allows existing users to vote on new members' photos, ensuring that the community maintains certain standards of attractiveness.

FAQItems.question: What kind of photo should I upload for my profile?
FAQItems.answer: Choose a high-quality selfie that accurately represents your appearance. Ensure good lighting and avoid filters or heavily edited photos.

FAQItems.question: How long does it take to get approval from the community?
FAQItems.answer: The approval process depends on the number of users and how quickly they vote. It may vary, but we aim for a timely and fair process.

FAQItems.question: What happens if I don't get enough votes for approval?
FAQItems.answer: If you don't receive enough votes, you will remain in pending status. You can continue to engage with the community and try again.
